ygData.subject: Re: The D.E.D
ygData.msgSnippet: Following behind the trio of ancient warriors came three more. A very dark and Sinister looking one taking up the lead, with a proud blue warrior in the front,

Subject: Re: The D.E.D

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Following behind the trio of ancient warriors came three more. A very
dark and Sinister looking one taking up the lead, with a proud blue
warrior in the front, and a swaggering gorilla. Beside them walked four
small robots, each 4 feet in height. The gorilla began to pound his
chest. "Yes, for to long you tell us not to fight in war" he howled
pointing at the three characters around the table. "Me very sick of you"
he said, spitting a large gob of oil onto the table. 

The three predacons could barely keep from gagging, this gorilla emmited
a disgusting oder. "The gruffer one took time to finally break the
braggarts speech. "Well now we want you to fight. The Autobots are going
to try something, and if we are ever going to revolt, they musnt be
allowed to see what has happened on earth" he says. "Speaking of which"
another one started. "It is time we contacted Motormaster. He turned
around, and clicked a few keys with a nimble hand, a moniter roaring to
life, and begining to send a message across space, and time.
